short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Remove unhealthy foods from the web.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
If you order a lot of food online, and you wish that you could avoid all of the unhealthy options, then this extension is for you!

Internet Diet makes it easy to block specific restaurants, foods, links, and websites.

It's optimized for use with food & grocery delivery services such as:

- postmates
- grubhub
- seamless
- doordash
- caviar
- uber eats
- delivery.com
- instacart
- walmart
- amazon

Just click the extension's icon and select "Block a link on this page", select the item you want to block, and anywhere that item appears will be blurred out. âœ¨

You can block an unlimited number of items, and you can even block entire websites.
